    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3724</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3724</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com és que segons per on passes, el mòbil no funciona?</string>
            <string language="en">How is that, depending where you are, your mobile doesn't work?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie ist, daß, abhängend, wo Sie sind, Ihr 
Mobile nicht arbeitet?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment est que, dépendant où vous êtes, votre
mobile ne fonctionne pas ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como é que, dependendo de onde você está, seu 
móbil não trabalha?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come è che, dipendendo dove siete, il vostro 
mobile non funziona?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς είναι αυτός, που εξαρτάται όπου είστε, κινητός 
σας όχι εργασία;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) sobre la cobertura a la telefonia mòbil en què es comenten les situacions en les quals normalment no hi ha cobertura i es justifiquen breument. Inclou un enllaç per aprofundir en el tema.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the range of mobile phones. It comments on situations where the phone has no signal and explains why. It includes a link for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunicació</string>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
            <string language="es">comunicación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologies de la informació i la comunicació</string>
            <string language="en">information and communications technology</string>
            <string language="es">tecnologías de la información y la comunicación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">tecnologia dels mitjans de comunicació</string>
            <string language="en">media technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf der Strecke 
der beweglichen Telefone. Sie kommentiert Situationen, in denen 
das Telefon kein Signal hat und erklärt warum. Sie schließt 
ein Link für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur l'intervalle des 
mobilophones. Il présente ses observations sur des situations 
où le téléphone n'a aucun signal et explique pourquoi. Il 
inclut un lien pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) na escala de telefones móveis.
Comenta nas situações onde o telefone não tem nenhum sinal e 
explica por que. Inclui uma ligação para uma informação mais
adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla gamma di telefoni mobili.
Commenta le situazioni dove il telefono non ha segnale e spiega 
perchè. Include un collegamento per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στη σειρά των κινητών 
τηλεφώνων. Σχολιάζει τις καταστάσεις όπου το τηλέφωνο δεν 
έχει κανένα σήμα και εξηγεί γιατί. Περιλαμβάνει μια 
σύνδεση για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kommunikation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informations- und Kommunikationstechnik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mediatechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie de l'information et de transmissions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie de medias</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia de informação e de comunicações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tecnologia dos media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comunicazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia di comunicazioni e delle informazioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tecnologia di media</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πληροφορίες και τεχνολογία επικοινωνιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνολογία μέσων</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
